channel.title: Now im pissed off
channel.description:
I dont get it, when i add barrow gloves into shops it crashed it. I can spawn them fine but when i put in shops i get this error..
Pwnscape Server. Connection from wnpgmb0517w-ad04-187-145.dynamic.mts.net:3341 [client-1-Jesse]: Jesse has Logged in. Connection from 69.162.78.26:55121 null has logged out. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1 0 7462" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:456) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:88) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:33) at server.main(server.java:131)
All i did was add barrows gloves and no doesent matter what item i type in it just nulls server, [br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 30, 2009, 01:38:44 am[/size][hr]Iv been haveiung this error for months and no fucking idea whats causes it i wanna kill a baby right now.
